title.narrative: Emergency Humanitarian assistance, resiliance building and support to local capacities and right-based approaches in crisi affected communities and HHs in Takhar and Badakhshan provinces of Afghanistan and refugees in Tajikistan

description.narrative: In Afghanistan the project will deliver immediate lifesaving relief providing 11000 households with cash to procure food, NFI, winterisation kits and other necessary services, and ensure access to drinking water with water purification and hygiene kits. To increase resilience against future shocks, the project will improve the food production and livelihoods of 5,6503,150 households. In Tajikistan, with the help of a local partner CAPS, the project will support 4,800 refugees with food distributions, winterization kits and access to medical services. As a resilience building measure, livelihoods activities relevant to the peri-urban environment will be implemented, and advocacy work and health and hygiene training will be carried out to reduce the vulnerability of the refugee communities.
